about_the_game:
This DLC provides the original version of realistic style character customization options. Players can choose realistic style character appearances, suitable for 10 built-in characters and custom characters. You can switch between the two styles at any time.
Note: This DLC looks similar to the original version of the character, and players who have the original version do not have to download it.

content_descriptors.notes: Not suitable for workplace visits, the product includes nudity and general sexual content, and all characters are at least 18 years old.

name: Fight Angel SE Realistic Pack

Minimum:
